column5: My house is in close proximity to the biggest attractions in Houston's inner-loop. With the light rail being only 0.4 miles (6 min walk) away, you're able to get to downtown, midtown, Texas medical center, and many other attractions for only $1.25 each way! If you're traveling from out of town, Hobby airport is only 15 mins away and IAH is only 25 mins away. The memory foam mattress and bedroom decor will make you feel at home. Perfect for couples, business travelers, solo, and students.
column8: Stunning Modern & Roomy Private Room in Downtown!
